Line 137: Line 137:
===''Voyager''===
===''Voyager''===
â
[[File:Seven of nine.jpg|thumb|[[Seven of Nine]] in ''[[Star Trek: Voyager]]'']]
  â  
The Borg make frequent appearances in ''[[Star Trek: Voyager]]'', which takes place in the Delta Quadrant, where the Borg make their home. The Borg are first discovered by ''Voyager'' in episode "[[Blood Fever (Voyager episode)|Blood Fever]]". Later [[Chakotay]] discovers a population of ex-Borg of various species in "[[Unity (Voyager episode)|Unity]]". In "[[Scorpion (Voyager episode)|Scorpion]]", the Borg are engaged in a futile war against the much more powerful [[Species 8472]]. In exchange for safe passage through Borg space, the ''Voyager'' crew devises a way to destroy the otherwise immune Species 8472. [[Seven of Nine|Seven of Nine, Tertiary Adjunct of Unimatrix 01]], is dispatched to ''Voyager'' to facilitate this arrangement.

Later [[Chakotay]] discovers a population of ex-Borg of various species in "[[Unity (Voyager episode)|Unity]]". In "[[Scorpion (Voyager episode)|Scorpion]]", the Borg are engaged in a futile war against the much more powerful [[Species 8472]]. In exchange for safe passage through Borg space, the ''Voyager'' crew devises a way to destroy the otherwise immune Species 8472.
